name: Build-A-Monster
description:
Build-A-Monster is a text-based interactive narrative about a magician/scientist trying to build a monster while their friends bother them to take breaks. It is part monster-dress-up room, part friend-dating simulator, and all how-not-to-deal-with-loss advice column.

This game was created for inkJam 2022. Photo used in logo and banner by Mel Poole on Unsplash. Photo used in background by Sincerely Media on Unsplash.
